item.title: Shakshuka 🍅🍳 One of my all time favorites Ingredients -R...
item.description:
Shakshuka 🍅🍳 One of my all time favorites Ingredients -Red bell pepper -Onion -Tomatoes (I used a mix of fresh and fire roasted canned tomatoes) -Garlic -Paprika -Coriander -Cumin seeds / ground cumin -Chili powder -Oregano -Salt -Eggs Toppings -Parsley -Mint -Yogurt Serve with some crusty bread or pita!
#cooking #shakshuka #recipe #breakfast

item.title: Parmigiana di melanzane🍆🍅 Straight from the garden for Mam...
item.description:
Parmigiana di melanzane🍆🍅 Straight from the garden for Mami Ingredients -Eggplant -Fresh tomatoes, Passata, Pomodorini… depends on preference and availability (: -Mozzarella -Parmigiano Reggiano DOP -Basil -Salt -Black Pepper -Flour -Frying Oil -Extra Virgin Olive Oil
#cooking #recipe #italy #eggplant #parmigiano #travel

item.title: Arroz Con Pollo using Ranchera Sauce and Pasta de Tomate. Pick...
item.description:
Arroz Con Pollo using Ranchera Sauce and Pasta de Tomate. Pick up Naturas at your local Hispanic retailer or follow my Amazon link in bio, and submit your recipes using the !  Un paquete. Mil posibilidades. Ingredients:  Naturas Ranchera Sauce Naturas Pasta de Tomate Chicken thighs and/or breast White jasmine rice Broth or water White or yellow onion Red bell pepper Garlic Frozen peas, carrots, and corn Cilantro Salt Black pepper Cumin Lime
@Natura’s Sauces USA #1000RecetasChallenge #NaturasPartner #NaturasUSA #1000RecetasChallenge
FULL POST | EMBED | REVERSED

item.title: Shepherd’s pie🇬🇧 Ingredients For the lamb filling: -Car...
item.description:
Shepherd’s pie🇬🇧 Ingredients For the lamb filling: -Carrots -Onion -Celery -Garlic -Peas (fresh or frozen) -Ground lamb -Salt -Black pepper -Tomato paste -Bay leaf -Rosemary -Thyme -Red wine -Lamb or beef stock -Worcestershire sauce -AP Flour (optional to thicken) For the potato topping: -Russet or Maris Piper potatoes -Butter -Milk and/or cream -Salt -White pepper -Egg yolk -White Cheddar Cheese (freshly grated)
#shepherdspie #uk #comfortfood
FULL POST | EMBED | REVERSED
